page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content:
An account of family life by a girl aged 11. A LAZY WEEKEND IN THE SUMMER
I wake up at about 9.30am and lie in bed until about 10.00am. I get up,get washed and then get dressed.When I go downstairs I usually play on the organ and then have breakfast which is Weetabix with a lot of milk.When I have finished, my older sister comes down for her breakfast. I go out and play on the hog-swing in the garden(and get very dizzy). Mum and Dad and my sister come out into the garden and we all sunbathe until 12.30pm when we have some lunch.We relax and play throughout the afternoon then come in and prepare for dinner time.After dinner we watch some television and then wash and go to bed after a lovely lazy day!
